title: ICYMI - Chadwick Boseman on Throwing Passion Behind a Revolutionary Idea in "Black Panther"
itunes:title: ICYMI - Chadwick Boseman on Throwing Passion Behind a Revolutionary Idea in "Black Panther"
description:
Actor Chadwick Boseman reflects on the many groundbreaking elements of "Black Panther" and explains why the film features a multitude of authentic African accents.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
